old:
<COL ffdc78>《淀みし大竜力》</COL>は最大４人のパーティーで
禊の神殿奥にある《淀みの渦》に再び現れた
竜力の化身と戦うエクストリームミッションです
new:
<COL ffdc78>Phantasmic Great Dragon</COL>
is an Extreme Mission in which a party of up to 4 people fight the incarnation of the dragon power that has reappeared
in the "Vortex of Stagnation" deep within the Temple of Purification.

old:
集う竜力は以前と比べ物にならないほど強大で
数多くの戦徒が生み出されては
あなたの前に立ち塞がります

敵の中に孤立しないよう立ち回りましょう
new:
The gathering Dragon Force is incredibly powerful, incomparable to before. 

Countless Myrmidons are being produced and they will stand in your way. 

Let's strategize so that you don't end up isolated among the enemies.
